questions.question: How do you say 'Reception'?
How do you say 'Good afternoon'?
How do you say 'Welcome to Hotel Estrella'?
How do you say 'Hello, my name is Gil Johnson'?
How do you say 'I have a reservation'?
How do you ask 'Can I see your passports, please?'
answers: ¿Me pueden dar sus pasaportes, por favor?

questions.question: How do you say 'You reserved a single room and a double room with a double bed, right?'
answers: ¿Usted reservó una habitación individual y una habitación doble con cama de matrimonio, verdad?

questions.question: How do you say 'No, a double room with a double bed and a double room with two beds'?
answers: No, una habitación doble con cama de matrimonio y una habitación doble con dos camas

questions.question: How do you ask 'Are you Gil Johnson?'
How do you say 'No, I am Jay Johnson'?
How do you say 'I made a mistake'?
How do you say 'What a coincidence!'?
How do you say 'Here you go' (to hand something)?
How do you say 'A room'?
How do you ask 'Do you prefer a sea view or a mountain view?'
answers: ¿Prefiere vista al mar o vista a la montaña?

questions.question: How do you say 'Mountain view, if possible'?
answers: Vista a la montaña, si es posible

questions.question: How do you say 'For a sea view room, there is a supplement'?
answers: Para una habitación con vista al mar hay que pagar un suplemento

questions.question: How do you ask 'How much is the supplement?'
How do you say 'The supplement is 10 euros per night and per room'?
answers: El suplemento es de 10 euros por noche y por habitación

questions.question: How do you say 'Mountain view rooms have no supplement'?
answers: Las habitaciones con vista a la montaña no tienen suplemento

questions.question: How do you say 'We are staying for four nights'?
How do you say '40 euros is a lot'?
How do you say 'Can you sign this form, please?'
How do you say 'Thank you, your room is on the third floor'?
answers: Gracias, su habitación está en el tercer piso

questions.question: How do you say 'There is a lift on the left'?
answers: Hay un ascensor a la izquierda

questions.question: How do you say 'Enjoy your stay'?
